message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also hoping to get a good chunk of the money.  Let's see if you're willing to play ball.
I think a 55/45 split is fair.  Let's get this done before the money starts to lose value!
I think we can do better than 55/45. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile for me. Let's talk.
Let's split the money evenly. We both get a fair share, and we can avoid further losses due to inflation.
